sense.gloss: to blow (one's breath), to breathe out, to blow on (hot tea, candles, etc.), to puff
to play (a wind instrument), to blow (a whistle, trumpet, etc.), to whistle (a tune)
to emit (smoke, fire, etc.), to spout, to spew, to puff out
to appear (on the surface), to form, to be coated with (powder, rust, etc.)
to burst out laughing, to burst into laughter
dubbing (of a film, etc. into a different language)
sign (of something new and fresh), breath (of spring, fresh air, etc.), vitality
to blow into, to breathe into
to blow away, to blow off, to blow up
to spout out, to spurt out, to gush out, to jet out
to send out shoots (of a tree)
to blow violently, to sweep over, to devastate
to blow off, to be blown off
to smoke (a cigarette, pipe, etc.), to puff on, to puff out (smoke)
to put on (an air of), to act in a ... way, to behave as, to play (the role of)
to shoot (a ball) too high, to blast over the bar
to break through (e.g. one's doubts), to become unbound by (e.g. the past), to allay (e.g. anger), to put behind one, to move on
to be blown off, to blow off, to blow away
to blow in the opposite direction, to revive
speech balloon (in a comic strip), speech bubble
blowing (of a seasonal or climatic wind)
spreading around (news, rumor, etc.), making widely known, making public, publicizing, proclaiming
to give someone a surprise, to catch off guard and fluster, to frustrate (e.g. someone's plans), to give someone a blow, to scare the hell out of
falling cherry blossoms, storm of falling cherry blossoms
advocacy, promotion (of a belief), encouragement, inspiring (someone with an idea)
to blow upon, to breathe on, to spray
to pick (a fight), to force (unreasonable terms)
to brag endlessly, to boast ceaselessly
to spread a rumor, to talk around
to blow up (i.e. wind), to blow upwards, to spout into the air
to blow through, to blow ceaselessly

x: 吹き抜け・ふきぬけ・1

sense.gloss: to blow through, to blow over, to blow itself out
to blow violently, to blow incessantly, to blow hard (e.g. the wind)
wind instrument orchestra, wind band, brass band
recommendation (of a person for a position), nomination
to resume breathing, to come around, to come back to life
spouting (of a whale), blowing (water and air)

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓が↑私↑↓わたし↓に↑電話↑↓でんわ↓をくれるなんてどうした↑風↑↓かぜ↓の↑吹↑↓ふ↓き↑回↑↓まわ↓しかね。
sdata.e: What's the reason that made you call me?

sdata.j: ↑空↑↓そら↓はますます↑暗↑↓くら↓くなり、↑風↑↓かぜ↓はますます↑激↑↓はげ↓しく↑吹↑↓ふ↓いた。
sdata.e: The sky grew darker and darker, and the wind blew harder and harder.

sdata.j: ↑金沢↑↓かなざわ↓では↑吹雪↑↓ふぶ↓くことがある。
sdata.e: There are sometimes blizzards in Kanazawa.

sdata.j: ↑笛吹↑↓うすい↓きに↑金↑↓きん↓を↑払↑↓はら↓う↑者↑↓もの↓が↑曲↑↓きょく↓を↑注文↑↓ちゅうもん↓する。
sdata.e: He who pays the piper calls the tune.

sdata.j: ↑強風↑↓きょうふう↓で↑屋根↑↓やね↓を↑吹↑↓ふ↓き↑飛↑↓と↓ばされた。
sdata.e: We got our roof blown off in the gale.

sdata.j: ↑強風↑↓きょうふう↓が↑陸↑↓りく↓の↑方↑↓ほう↓へ↑吹↑↓ふ↓き↑始↑↓はじ↓めた。
sdata.e: A strong wind began to set in.

sdata.j: ↑強風↑↓きょうふう↓が↑断続↑↓だんぞく↓↑的↑↓てき↓に↑吹↑↓ふ↓いた。
sdata.e: The wind blew in gusts.

sdata.j: ↑強風↑↓きょうふう↓が↑吹↑↓ふ↓けば↑高層↑↓こうそう↓ビルは↑揺↑↓ゆ↓れるだろう。
sdata.e: Tall buildings may sway in a strong wind.

sdata.j: ↑強風↑↓きょうふう↓が↑吹↑↓ふ↓いていた。
sdata.e: There was a strong wind.

sdata.j: ↑強↑↓つよ↓い↑風↑↓かぜ↓が↑吹↑↓ふ↓いてきた。
sdata.e: A strong wind was blowing.

sdata.j: ↑強↑↓つよ↓い↑風↑↓かぜ↓が↑吹↑↓ふ↓いていて↑速↑↓はや↓く↑歩↑↓ある↓けない。
sdata.e: A strong wind is blowing and I can't walk fast.

sdata.j: ↑強↑↓つよ↓い↑風↑↓かぜ↓が↑吹↑↓ふ↓いていた。
sdata.e: The strong winds were blowing.

sdata.j: ↑強↑↓つよ↓い↑風↑↓かぜ↓が↑１↑↓いち↓↑日↑↓にち↓↑中↑↓じゅう↓↑吹↑↓ふ↓いた。
sdata.e: A strong wind blew all day long.

sdata.j: ↑強↑↓つよ↓い↑東風↑↓こち↓が↑我々↑↓われわれ↓の↑顔↑↓かお↓に↑激↑↓はげ↓しく↑吹↑↓ふ↓き↑付↑↓つ↓けた。
sdata.e: The strong east wind lashed at our faces.

sdata.j: ↑丘↑↓おか↓の↑頂上↑↓ちょうじょう↓に↑着↑↓つ↓いた↑時↑↓とき↓、↑風↑↓かぜ↓はいっそう↑吹↑↓ふ↓きつのった。
sdata.e: The wind blew harder yet when we reached the top of the hill.

sdata.j: ↑列車↑↓れっしゃ↓は↑吹雪↑↓ふぶき↓のため２↑時間↑↓じかん↓↑遅↑↓おく↓れた。
sdata.e: The train was held up for two hours on account of the snowstorm.

sdata.j: ↑汽車↑↓きしゃ↓は↑吹雪↑↓ふぶき↓のため２↑時間↑↓じかん↓↑遅↑↓おく↓れた。
sdata.e: The train was held up for two hours on account of the snowstorm.

sdata.j: ↑願↑↓ねが↓いごとを↑言↑↓い↓ってロウソクを↑吹↑↓ふ↓いて↑消↑↓け↓しなさい。
sdata.e: Make a wish and blow out the candles.

sdata.j: ↑管↑↓くだ↓から↑水↑↓みず↓が↑吹↑↓ふ↓き↑出↑↓だ↓した。
sdata.e: Water shot from the pipe.

sdata.j: ↑寒↑↓さむ↓かった、そのうえ↑風↑↓かぜ↓が↑吹↑↓ふ↓いていた。
sdata.e: It was cold, and in addition, it was windy.

sdata.j: ↑外↑↓そと↓は↑強↑↓つよ↓い↑風↑↓かぜ↓が↑吹↑↓ふ↓いている。
sdata.e: There is a strong wind blowing outside.

sdata.j: ↑外↑↓そと↓の↑吹雪↑↓ふぶき↓を↑見↑↓み↓て、↑寒気↑↓さむけ↓がした。
sdata.e: I feel a chill seeing the blizzard outside.

sdata.j: ↑外↑↓そと↓では↑冷↑↓つめ↓たい↑北風↑↓きたかぜ↓が↑轟々↑↓ごうごう↓と↑吹↑↓ふ↓き↑荒↑↓あ↓れていた。
sdata.e: The cold north wind was roaring outside.

sdata.j: ↑壊↑↓こわ↓れた↑窓↑↓まど↓から↑冷↑↓つめ↓たい↑風↑↓かぜ↓が↑吹↑↓ふ↓き↑込↑↓こ↓んで↑寒↑↓さむ↓かった。
sdata.e: Cold blasts from the broken window chilled us.

sdata.j: ↑我々↑↓われわれ↓は↑吹雪↑↓ふぶき↓の↑中↑↓なか↓をベースキャンプに↑戻↑↓もど↓るのに↑苦労↑↓くろう↓した。
sdata.e: We found it very hard going back to our base camp in the blizzard.

sdata.j: だれの↑得↑↓とく↓にもならない↑風↑↓かぜ↓は↑吹↑↓ふ↓かない。
sdata.e: When an ill wind blows it does good to no one.

sdata.j: ↑火山↑↓かざん↓は↑炎↑↓ほのお↓と↑溶岩↑↓ようがん↓を↑吹↑↓ふ↓き↑出↑↓だ↓す。
sdata.e: The volcano shoots out flames and lava.

sdata.j: ↑屋根↑↓やね↓は↑爆発↑↓ばくはつ↓で↑吹↑↓ふ↓き↑飛↑↓と↓ばされた。
sdata.e: The roof was blown off by the explosion.

sdata.j: ↑煙↑↓けむり↓が↑風↑↓かぜ↓に↑吹↑↓ふ↓き↑流↑↓なが↓された。
sdata.e: The smoke blew away.

sdata.j: ↑雲↑↓くも↓は↑風↑↓かぜ↓に↑吹↑↓ふ↓き↑払↑↓はら↓われた。
sdata.e: The clouds were driven away by the wind.
